meanings.sent1: The ruralites in our town enjoy the peaceful countryside.
meanings.sent2: Many ruralites prefer the quiet life away from the city.
meanings.sent3: The ruralites organized a barn dance that was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The bond between ruralites is as strong as the roots of the old oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The ruralites' sense of community is like a warm blanket on a cold night.

meanings.definition: Characteristics or qualities of rural areas.
meanings.sent1: The ruralites of the landscape include vast fields and clear skies.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of nature is evident in the ruralites of this region.
meanings.sent3: The peacefulness of the ruralites can be quite calming after a hectic day.
meanings.sent4: The simplicity of ruralites is a refreshing change from the hustle and bustle of the city.
meanings.sent5: The ruralites of the countryside paint a picture of tranquility and serenity.
